email_chain.subject: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi John, I hope this email finds you well. I have a vessel available for a crude oil shipment from Houston to Rotterdam. The vessel is a 150,000 DWT Aframax with an LOA of 250 meters. The laycan is October 15-20. I’m quoting a freight rate in the low 50s, say $50.75 per metric ton. Let me know if this works for you or if you’d like to discuss further. Best regards, Sarah.

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi Sarah, thanks for the quick response. The laycan works for us, but the freight rate seems a bit high. Given the current market, we were hoping for something closer to $49.50 per metric ton. Can you check with the owner if they’re willing to adjust? Looking forward to your reply. Cheers, John.

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi John, I spoke with the owner, and they’re willing to come down to $50.00 per metric ton. This is their best offer given the current market conditions. Let me know if this works for you. Best, Sarah.

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi Sarah, thanks for following up. $50.00 per metric ton is acceptable. Let’s proceed with this rate. Can you confirm the laycan and provide the demurrage terms? Also, please send over the full vessel details for our records. Cheers, John.

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment - Confirmation
email_chain.body: Hi John, great to hear that $50.00 per metric ton works for you. The laycan remains October 15-20. Demurrage is set at $20,000 per day, pro rata. I’ve attached the full vessel details for your review. Let me know if you need anything else. Best regards, Sarah.

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment - Confirmation
email_chain.body: Hi Sarah, everything looks good. We’ll proceed with the booking. Please send over the contract for review and signature. Thanks for your help on this. Cheers, John.

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment - Contract
email_chain.body: Hi John, I’ve attached the contract for your review and signature. Let me know if you have any questions or need further clarifications. Looking forward to finalizing this. Best regards, Sarah.
